contents:
Feel sad when watch these news unfolded.
However it is a good opportunity for every Hong Konger around the World to work together to express ourselves. 

Hong Kong should be left alone!

Any administration should have learned that you cannot keep this territory when replacing all the Hong Kong people with persons grow-up and educated in China. 

It will not work!

They have to understand the mentality of Hong Kongers are class on its own.

We are internationally educated, globally connected and conscious aware.

It is how we wired and no one can take these qualities away from us.

We have no intension to harm. Yet we are adamantly to be oppressed!

Wake up!
